item.title: Connecting to the ENGR Filespace Using VSCode and SSH Keys on macOS/Linux
item.description: This guide is only designed for MacOS and Linux users. View the Windows guide here. SSH Keys (Optional) Check for Existing Keys If you are pretty sure you haven’t generated keys before, skip this step. Run this command in your terminal. ls -al ~/.ssh Look for files called id_rsa and id_rsa.pub. config id-rsa id-rsa.pub known_hosts If you see any existing keys, you can skip the next section, or delete them.

item.title: Markdown Syntax Guide
item.description: This article offers a sample of basic Markdown syntax that can be used in Hugo content files, also it shows whether basic HTML elements are decorated with CSS in a Hugo theme.
